formName: Application for Authorised Economic Operator (Section 1 C118-questionnaire)

fields.label: Your trader identification number is the same as your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number
EORI Number
Member states country codes
fields.infoText:
Find the required [member state country codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes#a "Member state country codes") here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.helpText: Enter your country code, for example GB, followed by your 12 numerical digit EORI number
fields.errorMessage: Input your country code and EORI number

sections.title: Have you got all the information you need? (0.1)

fields.infoText:
Please read the [European Commission’s Authorised Economic Operator (AEO) Guidelines](https://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/sites/taxation/files/resources/documents/customs/policy_issues/customs_security/aeo_guidelines_en.pdf) before applying for AEO.

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.label: Which departments, including management, have you involved in the process to prepare your company for the AEO application?
fields.shortName: Departments involved in preparing for AEO application
fields.helpText: Have you involved customs or third parties in the process (consultants etc)?

fields.label: What authorisation do you require?

fields.errorMessage: You must select customs simplification, security and safety or both

fields.infoText: State the name, address, date of establishment/registration and legal status of the organisation of the applying company. Please include the web page address (URL) of your company’s website, if applicable.

fields.label: Company name
Company address
Date of establishment
Legal status
Company website
Is your company part of a group?
fields.helpText: Select yes if your company is part of a group

fields.label: Provide a brief description of the group
Do any other entities in the group already have an AEO authorisation?
Have any other entities in the group already applied for AEO status and are currently undergoing an AEO audit by a national customs authority?
Does the application cover Permanent Business Establishments (PBE's)
Site full name
Full address of permanent business establishment
fields.helpText: Input the full address of your permanent business establishment including street number, postal code and city

fields.label: VAT registration number(s)
fields.helpText: Input GB and then the 9 numerical digits of the permanent business establishment's VAT registration number(s)

fields.label: Has the company been established for less than 3 years due to an internal reorganisation of a previously existing company (eg incorporation or sale of a business unit)?
Provide details of the reorganisation of your company
shdspacer
fields.infoText: Over the next four pages you will be asked the following:

fields.label: UKQuestion
fields.infoText: * How many of the people involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business are UK nationals?

fields.label: What we need to know about UK nationals
fields.infoText:
We need the persons name and national insurance number.

If they are a main shareholder we also need to know what percentage of shares they hold in the business

Once you have filled in those details you will need to indicate their role in the business from the options given, you may select more than one.

fields.label: Non-UKQuestion
fields.infoText: * How many of the people involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business are Non-UK nationals?

fields.label: What we need to know about Non-UK nationals
fields.infoText:
We need the persons name, date of birth and residential address.

If they are a main shareholder we also need to know what percentage of shares they hold in the business

Once you have filled in those details you will need to indicate their role in the business from the options given, you may select more than one.

fields.label: dataRequired
fields.infoText:
* Who are the owners or main shareholders for your business?
* Who are the owners or main shareholders involved in the day to day running of your business?
* Who are the board members or managers of your business?
* Who are the advisory board or board of directors members of your business?
* Who is the person in charge of your company or exercising control over your companys management?

sections.title: UK nationals involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business

fields.label: How many people involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business are UK nationals?
Who should I include?
fields.infoText:
Include all people in the following roles that are UK nationals:

* Main Shareholder

* Main Shareholder involved in the day to day running of your business

* Board members or managers

* Advisory board or board of directors members

* Person in charge of your company or exercising control over your companys management?

sections.title: UK national involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business $n

fields.label: Owner or main shareholder full name
fields.helpText: Input the full name of this person

fields.label: Owner or main shareholder national insurance (NI) number
fields.helpText: Input the national insurance number of this person

fields.label: Percentage of shares held
fields.helpText: Input the percentage of share held by this person, if they are not a shareholder leave blank

fields.label: Roles held
fields.helpText: Tick all roles that apply to this person
choices: Main Shareholder involved in day to day running of the business
Advisory board member or member of board of directors
Person in charge of company or exercising control over company management

sections.title: Non UK nationals involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business

fields.label: How many owners or main shareholders are not UK nationals
fields.helpText: Input the number of owners or main shareholders who are not UK nationals

fields.label: Who should I include?
fields.infoText:
Include all  people in the following roles that are Non-UK nationals:

* Main Shareholder

* Main Shareholder involved in the day to day running of your business

* Board members or managers

* Advisory board or board of directors members

* Person in charge of your company or exercising control over your companys management?

sections.title: Non UK national involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business $n

fields.label: Full name
fields.helpText: Input the full name of this person

fields.label: Residential address
fields.helpText: Input this persons full residential address including country here

fields.label: date of birth
fields.helpText: Input this persons date of birth

fields.label: Percentage of shares held
fields.helpText: Input the percentage of shares held by this person, if not applicable leave blank

fields.label: Roles held
fields.helpText: Tick all roles that apply to this person
choices: Main Shareholder involved in day to day running of the business
Advisory board member or member of board of directors
Person in charge of company or exercising control over company management

fields.label: Is the person responsible for customs matters a UK national?

fields.helpText: Input the full name of person responsible for customs matters

fields.label: Address
fields.helpText: Input the address of the person responsible for customs matters

fields.label: date of birth
fields.helpText: Input the date of birth of the person responsible for customs matters

sections.title: Consent to disclose the AEO details on the TAXUD website (1.1.10a)

fields.label: Do you hereby give your consent to the publication of the information in the AEO authorisation in the list of authorised economic operators

sections.title: Consent to disclose the AEO details on the TAXUD website

fields.infoText: The completed questionnaire should be signed by a director/managing partner/sole proprietor as appropriate but for this case it is recommended that consent is given by an authorised signatory.

fields.label: Full name
fields.helpText: Input the full name of the person giving consent to disclose AEO details

fields.label: Status in the business
Date consent is given

sections.title: Consent to the exchange of the information in the AEO authorisation (1.1.10b)

fields.label: Do you hereby give your consent to the exchange of the information in the AEO authorisation in order to ensure the implementation of international agreements with third countries on mutual recognition of the status of authorised economic operators and measures related to security

sections.title: Consent to the exchange of the information in the AEO authorisation

fields.infoText: The completed questionnaire should be signed by a director/managing partner/sole proprietor as appropriate but for this case it is recommended that consent is given by an authorised signatory.

fields.label: Full name
fields.helpText: Input the full name of the person giving consent to disclose AEO details

fields.label: Status in the business
Date consent is given

If 'Yes', by whom and how (directly or indirectly)?

fields.label: How, and by whom, is the tariff classification of goods decided?
What quality assurance measures do you take to make sure that tariff classifications are correct (for example, checks, plausibility checks, internal working instructions, regular training)?
Do you keep notes on these quality assurance measures?
fields.shortName: Notes kept on quality assurance measures (1.3.2c)

fields.label: Do you regularly monitor the effectiveness of your quality assurance measures?

How and by whom is the customs value established?

Do you regularly monitor the effectiveness of your quality assurance measures?
Do you keep notes on these quality assurance measures?

fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
